title: Peanut Butter & Jelly Principle - Zero Knowledge Assumption
description: Foundation principle requiring every instruction to be executable by someone with ZERO prior knowledge
purpose: Ensure all procedures are accessible to complete beginners without hidden assumptions
scope: Applied to all documentation, SOPs, and user-facing instructions
commanders_intent: How do we ensure every instruction is so clear that anyone can follow it successfully?
core_principle: Every step must be executable by someone with ZERO prior knowledge - like making a PB&J sandwich from scratch

knowledge_content.fundamental_rule: Assume nothing. Explain everything. Test with novices.

success_criteria: Complete novices can execute procedures successfully
No hidden assumptions remain in instructions
